title: Business Systems Developer - Bogotá, Colombia
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it!
description: Evaluate business processes to streamline, automate and deliver systematic solutions to significantly reduce time spent on manual processes. Assess scope and prioritize the most impactful solutions. Become the systems SME, both within Latin America (ALAC) and with worldwide partners. Represent the interests of the region and partner with sales teams to coordinate and implement best methodologies.
key_qualifications: 8+ years of proven experience working on business processes and systems implementation, Fully proficient in Database management skills (mySQL), Python / Bash scripting proficiency, Experience with Pandas / Numpy / Plotly / Dash (Python packages), Deep knowledge of PHP programming, Demonstrated experience with Business Objects and Tableau (Data Analytics tools / Datasource & Dashboard building), Advanced knowledge of Excel including Visual Basic (VBA), Proficient in consuming REST APIs to integrate and interact with external systems, Proficiency in English and Spanish is required, Strong organizational, presentation, and analytical skills, Engineering or Computer Science degree required
preferred_qualifications: Ability to design, develop, and maintain API integrations using appropriate authentication methods (e.g., OAuth, API keys), Experience handling JSON and XML formats for data exchange, Familiarity with cloud services and architectures, particularly AWS and/or GCP, Experience with GCP services such as Google Cloud Storage, Compute Engine, SQL, Experience with project management and project management tools (e.g. Wrike), Exceptional interpersonal and presentation skills, Portuguese language skills are desirable, Ability to work on multiple initiatives with short and overlapping timelines, Self-motivated and self-starter with initiative to deliver results with minimal direction, MBA a plus
